replies.body: I'm not sure, but I'll be pretty excited when I get to play it again. Let's both keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) so we can be sure to know when it comes back. (/^▽^)/

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aXuhifxF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-03T04:57:27.895+0000)
>
> I'm not sure, but I'll be pretty excited when I get to play it again. 

Same ! Glad to see someone at Rito Games also likes URF. Maybe there is still a chance.

> Let's both keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) so we can be sure to know when it comes back. (/^▽^)/
> 

The same way I kept an eye on the News Page for the last MONTHS without ever seeing URF mode ? ( ཀ ʖ̯ ཀ)
Probably on (or near) [Urf Day](https://goo.gl/hXE1Sw), as it does every year
